subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alex Kovalev scored a power-play goal 2 minutes 30 seconds into overtime Saturday night to give the Montreal Canadiens a 3-2 victory over the visiting Boston Bruins.
snippet: Alex Kovalev scored a power-play goal 2 minutes 30 seconds into overtime Saturday night to give the Montreal Canadiens a 3-2 victory over the visiting Boston Bruins.
